lead_paragraph: A deadlock on immigration “condemns millions to life in the shadows,” one reader writes. Another praises Justice Anthony Kennedy for not voting ideologically.

headline.main: Supreme Court Rulings on Immigration and Affirmative Action
headline.print_headline: Court Rulings on Immigration and Affirmative Action

snippet: A deadlock on immigration “condemns millions to life in the shadows,” one reader writes. Another praises Justice Anthony Kennedy for not voting ideologically.
